definition: to set/to fix/to determine/to decide/to order
a period of time/phase/stage/classifier for issues of a periodical, courses of study/time/term/period/to hope/Taiwan pr. [qi2]

sentences.english: It has been held irregularly since 1995.
Due to delayed and irregular reporting these, figures should be considered provisional.
sentences.chinese: 由于延迟和不定期报告，应将这些数字视为临时数字。

sentences.english: E. g. If you don't bathe your dog regularly, it might get stinky.
sentences.chinese: 如果你不定期给小狗洗澡，它会变得臭臭的。

sentences.english: Special teams will be sent occasionally to patrol at major oil and chemical ports.
sentences.chinese: 政府将不定期地安排特派团巡视主要的石油化学港口。

sentences.english: Members are entitled to participate in all kinds of activities for all members on an irregular base.
sentences.chinese: 参加花园城中心不定期为会员举办的各种会员活动。

sentences.english: Mr. Mitchell is now in the Egyptian capital Cairo on an unscheduled visit.
sentences.chinese: 米切尔现在正于埃及首都开罗进行一次不定期的访问。

sentences.english: The bushing is designed to specialized ladder-shaped trough;
sentences.chinese: 专业的不定期梯形槽设计衬套。

sentences.english: I want a first-class open return.
sentences.chinese: 我想要一张回程不定期的头等往返票。

sentences.english: I will also join the non-periodical actions for the following associations.
sentences.chinese: 我亦会不定期的参与以下机构的活动。

sentences.english: Whether to cope with successive, customer audits from time to time to worry?
sentences.chinese: 是否在为应对接二连三，不定期的客户验厂而烦恼？

sentences.english: Regretfully, we can’t regulate the irregular liner on the gulf.
sentences.chinese: 遗憾的是我们不能调整海湾上不定期的班船。

sentences.english: If the parties do not conclude it in written form, it shall be deemed an unfixed lease.
sentences.chinese: 当事人未采用书面形式的，视为不定期租赁。

sentences.english: At the same time, the expert comes to centre to guide a job abroad aperiodically .
sentences.chinese: 同时，国外专家不定期来中心指导工作。

sentences.english: We shall send emails regarding your application ocasionally.
sentences.chinese: 我们会不定期发送关于你的申请的信息到你的邮件。

sentences.english: Quizzes may occasionally be used to test comprehension of reading assignments.
sentences.chinese: 为了对阅读作业的理解做测验将会有不定期的随堂考。

sentences.english: Only a week after the quake, Tokyo was facing rolling blackouts.
sentences.chinese: 灾难发生仅一周首都东京已经开始不定期停电。

definition: at set dates/at regular intervals/periodic/limited to a fixed period of time/fixed term
to fix a time/fixed time/timed (of explosive etc)
to answer questions (as teacher or consultant)/to clarify doubts
specially engaged/employed or commissioned for a special task
